title: Magnificent Diamond & Gemstone Haaram with Intricate Pendant
materials: Crafted in high-purity gold. Features brilliant-cut diamonds (estimated clarity VVS)
and lush emeralds. Pink Mny detailing. Finished with a traditional Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases a cascading floral pattern, meticulously crafted with pavé-set diamonds. The pendant features a central emerald surrounded by a halo of diamonds and a cluster of pink Mny drops. Design inspired by Mughal artistry, reflecting the grandeur of Hyderabad's rich heritage.
colors: Predominantly gold with the sparkling white brilliance of diamonds. Accented by the vibrant red of rubies
and the soft pink of the pink mny gemstones.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Also ideal for special occasions such as Seemantham (సీమంతం)
description: This Haaram is a true masterpiece, blending traditional South Indian design with modern gemstone setting techniques. Its timeless elegance, exceptional craftsmanship, and significant gemstone weight make it a valuable heirloom piece. The vibrant colors and sparkling diamonds will make you the center of attention. Its heritage craftsmanship and durability is an investment for generations.
